Text.Page:
Time for some payback! Hunt down some {@LinkCreature:39#110#guardian} and {@LinkCreature:39#270#merciless ovoliths} in the lower levels of Arachnaea and kill them!

Deliver proof of death to Greina at Roughneck Outpost.
We appreciate the work you've done for the federation.
There are rewards available for doing the federation's work.
